welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Garbagnate Milanese! Known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history, we invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours by providing their email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
